job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtData Scientist  CommunitiesltbrgtThe Selling Partner Communities SPC organization builds lasting connections with and among our Selling Partners helps drive their success and ensures that public perception mirrors the reality that Amazons stores are a great place for our Selling Partners to build and maintain thriving businesses Forums are used by over a million Selling Partners to connect with each other and Amazon and get important information and advice on how to successfully run their Amazon business Amazons role in this is to 1 Proactively communicating and actively engaging in multidirectional channels for Selling Partners and Amazon 2 Fostering an active and helpful community and information exchange among Selling Partners 3 Understanding Selling Partners perceptions of and being internal advocates to improve their experience selling on Amazon and 4 Accelerating and strengthening evangelism advocacy and partnerships among and on behalf of Selling Partners These strategic initiatives are built upon the data that SPC Data Science and Analytics curates and provides alongside the insights that we are able to deliver through collaborative analyses with our business leadersltbrgtltbrgtData Scientists on this team have end to end range and capabilities They work directly with our program leaders to understand how they use data to gain a sense of a voice of the seller at scale They will dive into the data to identify trends draw similarities draw correlations between how sellers engage within the Communities space and how that translates into their bottom line They will be responsible for deriving a value proposition for our business in the lens of a downstream impact They design modeling frameworks to dive deep into these raw sources of information to get the most out of the data they have They work directly with data engineers to build automated pipelines and production scale information systems and models They collaborate with BI engineers to build automated tools which will allow their results to be shared with the business at scale They align with business owners to continuously track their work to ensure maximum impact from their projects They monitor performance of their work to evaluate whether improvements are needed after tracking has started in productionltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBasic Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt 5 Years of experience in data scienceanalysisengineeringltligtltligt 3 Years of experience applying StatisticsData ScienceMachine Learningltligtltligt 3 Years of Scripting experience in PythonR or other scripting languagesltligtltligt 2 Years of SQL experienceltligtltligt 2 Years of experience in Data Visualization using Tableau R Shiny other off the shelf products or scripting directlyltligtltligt Bachelors Degree in Data Science Computer Science Information Systems Data Analytics or related
